title: Edinburgh man spots strange 'UFO lights' that 'disappear' above Pentland Hills
description: The man was puzzled at what he captured on his mobile phone. He said four or five lights formed in a line before disappearing without a trace.

title: 3I/ATLAS Revelation: UFO Researcher Unveils CIA Decision to Classify Interstellar Files
description: The CIA issues a 'Glomar' response over interstellar object 3I/ATLAS. Explore the 'triple-jet' mystery and Professor Avi Loeb's theory on alien technosignatures.
